prompt.content: Using Stride, Inc, (ticker: LRN) 10-K for fiscal year ended June 30, 2025 calculate aEBITDA margin for 2025. Make sure to factor Impairments of fixed assets, SBC and non-cash operating lease expense.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2025 Revenues (located in Income Statement) = $2,405,317 thousand"},{"criteria":"FY2025 Operating Income (located in Income Statement) = $360,094 thousand","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2025 D&A (located in Cash Flow Statement) = $114,669 thousand"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Simple EBITDA (Operating Income + D&A) = $474,763 thousand"},{"criteria":"FY2025 SBC (located in Cash Flow Statement) = $36,794 thousand","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2025 Impairment of long-lived assets (located in Cash Flow Statement) = $59,478 thousand","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2025 Non-cash operating lease expense (located in Cash Flow Statement) = $12,265 thousand"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Adjusted EBITDA (Simple EBITDA + SBC + Impairment + Non-cash operating lease) = $583,300 thousand"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Adjusted EBITDA margin = 583,300 รท 2,405,317 = 24.25%"}]
